description: STRING No. 2 // From 2015-09-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // Obscure Alternatives was shown in the show Polite Emblems // Obscure Alternatives. The painting is the second painting in the time-based conceptual artwork STRING by Jonas Kasper Jensen.
name: Obscure Alternatives
